name: In re Janice F. STOUGHTON v. George D. KINZEY, et al.

parties: In re Janice F. STOUGHTON v. George D. KINZEY, et al.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
Petition for Review is denied. Upon return of the record, the Court of Common Pleas of Westmoreland County is to consider all issues raised in post-trial motions not previously considered.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
450 A.2d 646
In re Janice F. STOUGHTON v. George D. KINZEY, et al.
No. 149 W.D. Allocatur Docket, 1982.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Sept. 27, 1982.
